name: UCLA Anderson - Wireframing with Figma
description:
A Live workshop for UCLA Anderson on January 21, 2022.


Learn how to wireframe using the popular prototyping tool Figma in this hands-on workshop.


HIGHLY recommended for PMs, Marketers and Innovators, or anyone looking to learn how to wireframe and create product concepts, designs, and prototypes.


Workshop goals:

  1. Understand how and when to use Wireframing
  2. Start to get comfortable in Figma
  3. Create your first Wireframe and Prototype
  4. Put Wireframing & Figma as skills on your Resume
